content:
How was your harvest today?
I saw you running around with those shellfish tongs,
Though from your expression, it seems you didn't really care if you caught anything!
info: 闲聊-关于玩家手持赶海钳闲聊（日常）-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content: If your acting isn't convincing enough, you'll easily scare away those multi-legged creatures! {什么？}
info: 闲聊-关于玩家手持赶海钳闲聊（日常）-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
"Shadows from the other shore draw near,
More swift than waves rolling to the beach.
And our time rushes, breath by breath, toward its end."
info: 闲聊-关于玩家手持赶海钳闲聊（日常）-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
Is that tool in your hands
meant for catching creatures playing by the sea?
Remember to pace yourself and time your breathing just right,
info: 闲聊-关于玩家手持赶海钳闲聊（日常）-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
That's what came to mind when I saw you with those shellfish tongs,
you know, from the sea creatures' perspective.
Hehehe~he!
info: 闲聊-关于玩家手持赶海钳闲聊（日常）-1003乐福_单一闲聊
